meanings.definition: A solid emulsion of fat globules, air, and water made by churning milk or cream.
meanings.sent1: I spread butter on my toast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The butter melted on the hot pancakes.
meanings.sent3: The butter decided to take a swim in the coffee cup.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth as butter on a warm biscuit.
meanings.sent5: The buttery sunset painted the sky in shades of gold.

meanings.sent1: She likes to butter her bread before adding jam.
meanings.sent2: Please butter the pan before pouring the pancake batter.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to butter up to the dog for a treat.
meanings.sent4: His words were meant to butter her up for a favor.
meanings.sent5: The politician tried to butter up the voters with promises.
